Sentencas: The proton-conducting solid oxide electrolysis cell is a promising technology for energy storage and hydrogen production.
Titulo: Energy storage and hydrogen production by proton conducting solid oxide electrolysis cells with a novel heterogeneous design

Sentencas: However, because of the aggressive humid condition in the air electrode side, the stability of electrolysis cells is still a concern.
Titulo: Energy storage and hydrogen production by proton conducting solid oxide electrolysis cells with a novel heterogeneous design

Sentencas: In addition, the energy efficiency needs further improvement before its practical application.
Titulo: Energy storage and hydrogen production by proton conducting solid oxide electrolysis cells with a novel heterogeneous design

Sentencas: In this work, considering both stability and energy efficiency, a novel heterogeneous design is proposed for proton-conducting solid oxide electrolysis cells.
Titulo: Energy storage and hydrogen production by proton conducting solid oxide electrolysis cells with a novel heterogeneous design

Sentencas: In this heterogeneous design, the merits of proton-conducting materials can be taken advantage of and the drawbacks of proton-conducting materials can be circumvented synchronously, resulting in better stability and higher efficiency of electrolysis cells.
Titulo: Energy storage and hydrogen production by proton conducting solid oxide electrolysis cells with a novel heterogeneous design

Sentencas: The feasibility and advantages of the heterogeneous design are demonstrated in electrolysis cells with yttrium and zirconium co-doped barium cerate-nickel as the fuel electrode material and yttrium-doped barium zirconate as the electrolyte material by experiment and modeling.
Titulo: Energy storage and hydrogen production by proton conducting solid oxide electrolysis cells with a novel heterogeneous design

Sentencas: The experimental results demonstrate that compared with the conventional homogeneous design, this novel design can efficiently improve the proton conductivity of the yttrium-doped barium zirconate electrolyte (from 0.88 x 10(-3) S cm(-1) to 2.13 x 10(-3) S cm(-1) at 873 K) and slightly improve the ionic transport number of the electrolyte (from 0.941 to 0.964 at 873 K), resulting in better electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Energy storage and hydrogen production by proton conducting solid oxide electrolysis cells with a novel heterogeneous design

Sentencas: The electrolysis cells with this design also show good stability.
Titulo: Energy storage and hydrogen production by proton conducting solid oxide electrolysis cells with a novel heterogeneous design

Sentencas: Moreover, the simulation results show that the faradaic efficiency and energy efficiency of electrolysis cells are improved by applying this novel design.
Titulo: Energy storage and hydrogen production by proton conducting solid oxide electrolysis cells with a novel heterogeneous design

Sentencas: These impressive results demonstrate that heterogeneous design is a rational design for high-performance and efficient proton-conducting solid oxide electrolysis cell.
Titulo: Energy storage and hydrogen production by proton conducting solid oxide electrolysis cells with a novel heterogeneous design
